DataElement.preferredName: Definitive Treatment Evidence of Disease Present after Completion of Therapy CPTAC Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response to indicate whether or not evidence of disease was present after the completion of definitive therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Definitive Treatment Evidence of Disease Present after Completion of Therapy
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The treatment plan for a disease or disorder that has been chosen as the best one for a patient after all other choices have been considered._A question about whether evidence of disease was present after the completion of therapy.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).
